Tap here to get started!: Kha vha putedze hafha uri vha thoma!
You can choose whether you want to add i: Vha nga nanga uri vha khou ṱoḓa u dzhenisa mbuelo kana tshumiso ya masheleni kha tshitatamennde tsha mbuelo tshavho
Let's go through one example! Tap income: Kha ri sedze nga kha tsumbo nthihi! Kha vha puṱedze mbuelo
See a list of income types. For income t: Kha vha lavhelese mutevhe wa tshaka dza mbuelo. Mbuelo isiho kha mutevhe, vha nga nanga 'Other'
Let's pretend you received a donation to: Kha ri ite muhoyo wa unga vho ṱanganedza masheleni a u thusa ṋamusi, kha vha puṱedze hafha!
You will need to fill in all the info on: Vha ḓo fanela u dadza mafhungo othe kha tshikirini itshi
I've filled in an example for you! Now t: Ndo vha ḓadzela tsumbo! Zwino kha vha puṱedze Save
Great! Your income has now been added to: Khezwo! Mbuelo yavho yo dzheniswa kha samari ya tshitatamennde tsha mbuelo kha gunubu ya masheleni
You can see, change, or download you sta: Vha kho vhona, tshanduko, kana dawuniḽoudu zwitatamennde zwavho nga u puṱedza gunubu iyi.
Great job, you're ready to start!: Khezwo! Mbuelo yavho yo ḓadziwa kha samari ya tshitatamennde tsha mbuelo kha gunubu ya masheleni.
